attributes.action: Change the TV license to only apply to the BBC and BBC iPlayer.
attributes.additional_details: The narrative explaining the rules for watching TV issued by the TV Licensing are muddled and biased towards the BBC.
attributes.background: Advertising revenue and subscriptions finance all other TV channels.  The TV license restricts watching all live programs which is unacceptable.

departments.name: Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316904
